title.rendered: Alain Leber is joining Ancient Greek Sandals as Head of Menswear Design

content.rendered:
Ancient Greek Sandals is proud to announce that Alain Leber is joining the company as Head of Menswear Design. Working alongside AGS Creative Director Christina Martini, Alain takes over the Menswear line of Ancient Greek Sandals, bringing his unique style to Ancient Greek Sandals traditional manufacturing techniques.

Having extensive experience in the Industry, heading up Mens and Womens shoe design teams at international luxury brands such as Louis Vuitton, Burberry and Michel Perry, along with his own brand, Monsieur Alain will be introducing his first collection for Ancient Greek Sandals SS24.

It was in 2003 when Alain Leber and I met at the studio of Louis Vuitton in Paris, where we worked alongside Fabrizio Viti. For about 6 years, we were sitting next to each other, we travelled together, ate together and most importantly became friends. I always admired his talent, designing chic Mens shoes and for a long time I have been thinking about asking him to design the Mens collection for AGS, but he was always too busy either working for LV where he stayed for 13 years or for Burberry in London. This year, finally, the time has come! Christina Martini, Ancient Greek Sandals, Creative Director.

I am so happy to be joining Ancient Greek Sandals as the Lead designer for Menswear. I love Christinas work and what she represents. I hope to have brought a touch of inclusive masculinity in Christinas feminine world of Ancient Greek. Alain Leber, Ancient Greek Sandals, Head of Menswear Design.

For Summer 2024, Ancient Greek Sandals has completely revisited their Mens Collection, looking into their strong heritage and delivering a merge of traditional and modern interpretation. This season, our craftsmanship is expressed through an offer of new structures, new functionalities as well as an important choice of materials and colors. A fine line has been drawn associating our iconic vegetal leathers with a rope, fabric or tapisserie to create the expression of poetique masculinity. Our collection of sandals, eclectic and universal, is aspiring to a man strongly rooted in time.

To learn more about Ancient Greek Sandals, visit https://www.ancient-greek-sandals.com/en/eur.
